GetOrderShipping.Statement: SELECT w2_OrderShipping.shipping_check_no, w2_OrderShipping.order_id, w2_User.name, w2_Order.order_price_subtotal, w2_Order.order_date, w2_Order.order_payment_status @@ select @@ FROM w2_Order INNER JOIN w2_OrderShipping ON ( w2_OrderShipping.order_id = w2_Order.order_id ) INNER JOIN w2_User ON ( w2_Order.user_id = w2_User.user_id ) WHERE w2_OrderShipping.shipping_check_no <> '' AND w2_Order.order_date >= @order_date_from @@ where @@
